sub-1: The first & Only commission free broker in the Middle East, Stop Paying for What's FREE with MerQuant
sub-2: Experience trading in an easy and unique way with MerQuant
sub-3:
MerQuant is the first commission-free brokerage firm, allowing people to trade in the Egyptian, Saudi and Emirates stock market. Making investing more accessible and simplified through removing entry barriers. In addition to a wide array of services from various educational and trading services.

Knowing the fees and other charges that might apply to you is essential to making the most of your investment. Furthermore, following is a partition of services traditional brokerage firms make you pay for (Minimums, Withdrawal fees, Data, Advisory services). Basically, you pay for everything, even the loss.
You pay none of these with MerQuant
sub-4:
MerQuant is the first commission-free online broker in the MENA region. Made for the new generation of young investors by making investment more accessible and simplified than ever.
In other words, everything you’ve been paying for concerning any investment services will be free with MerQuant. Therefor, let’s break down things a little bit.
sub-4-1-1: All buy/sell orders are commission free using MerQuant in local and global stock markets. Because of our vision to support information technology, and encourage people to invest.
sub-4-2-1: MerQuant is subjected to the highest standards for information security.
sub-4-3-1: MerQuant Offers the possibility for stock trading in the local and global markets, without taking any commissions.
header-5: All You Need In One App!
sub-5-1-1: MerQuant offers the right tools needed to analyise the stock market yourself, in addition to the experts advice, news and much more, all FREE.
sub-5-2-1: MerQuant application adjusts with your investment goals, offering you advisory and notifications services that matter to you. Using the latest Artificial Intelligence technologies.
sub-5-3-1: Easy to get started, without minimum amount of money to open your account or any fees. In addition to the free tutorials and advisory services to help young investors learn and invest.
sub-5-4-1: MerQuant is designed to be suitable for stock trading experts and amateurs too. Without sacrificing the mandatory tools needed by expert users.
